title: Emotion-Based Foreign Language Speaking Online Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language communication skills and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening emotion management strategies linked to workplace environments for employees, with a design centered on real-time smartphone-based interactions.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize five key emotional states (anxiety, confidence, interest, etc.) and apply them to speaking contexts.
Learners perform emotion-reflective speaking practice at least three times a week using digital tools (voice recording app, emotion diary app).
Learners demonstrate emotional flexibility in work-related topics (e.g., presentations, negotiations) through role-play simulations.
Learners can create an emotional map of their speaking style based on peer feedback.
Learners produce and present a 3-minute emotion-based speaking portfolio at the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
